entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
